alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 12:25AM CDT until May 25 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN GREER AND SOUTHEASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Vinson, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Granite, Willow, and Brinkman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to localized flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
